name: Scream Flying - Eighth Note Go
description:
Scream flying, the endless crazy voice control game with infinite fun comes! Control your voice to avoid obstacles and keep the character flying. Soft voice to keep flying, scream to fly higher and farther.

How to Play Our Game?
* Shout out to start game
* Control your voice to keep the character flying
* Avoid obstacles to get higher score
* Record your game video to share with friends
* Collect notes to unlock fantastic characters with special effects.

Small tips: Please try to choose a nice and quiet environment to play the game.

Key features
* 18+ outstanding new characters
* Endless possibilities
* Elegant UI with multiple game scenarios
* Easily share to Facebook, Twitter etc.

Download now and play with your friends. We hope you enjoy the game.

Good luck!

Special thanks to your rating and comments. We'd like to hear!:)
Contact us directly at feedback@gpower.co
